channel.title: Change monster hp, and other stuff about some stuff that invovles EXP.HITS ETC
channel.description:
Ppl on my server are massing so i've decided to get ride of the hay stuff (BLOCK OFF) So i need help to adjust how much exp you get from attacking an NPC...Also how can i change what YOU hit on an NPC...And how do i change a monsters HP?...Lastly how do i change what the monster hits on you? And if you could direct me to a tut that can help me or can you give a good explanation of how to...
Ty =]

item.title: Change monster hp, and other stuff about some stuff that invovles EXP.HITS ETC
item.dc:creator: @i_owned_u_ha i owned u ha
item.description:
@i_owned_u_ha wrote:

go to npc.cfg and look for the npc u need press ctrl+f and the npc id and next to that will be the lvl of the monster and next to that will be hp change the hp to what u want and to change the xp rate go in client.java and change the hitdiff

Read full topic
item.source: Change monster hp, and other stuff about some stuff that invovles EXP.HITS ETC

item.title: Change monster hp, and other stuff about some stuff that invovles EXP.HITS ETC

item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

client.java and find combatexp change it there…
